state_added: mobileMenuOpen: boolean state for tracking menu visibility
ui_components_added: IconButton with MenuIcon, responsive display (xs: flex, md: none)

patterns_discovered.description: Used sx prop with breakpoint objects (xs, md) to show hamburger menu only on mobile screens

patterns_discovered.pattern: React state management for UI toggles
patterns_discovered.description: Simple boolean state with toggle handler for menu visibility control
Added aria-label attribute to IconButton for screen reader support
Consistent IconButton dimensions (44x44) for touch targets

gotchas_discovered.gotcha: Menu state created but not utilized
gotchas_discovered.description: mobileMenuOpen state is toggled but no corresponding mobile menu drawer/menu component is rendered based on this state
gotchas_discovered.impact: Hamburger icon is clickable but does nothing visible

gotchas_discovered.description: display: { xs: 'flex', md: 'none' } hides on md and larger screens, requires understanding of MUI breakpoints
gotchas_discovered.impact: Desktop users won't see the hamburger menu, which is intentional but worth noting

gotchas_discovered.description: Subtask marked as SUCCESS but mobile menu drawer/navigation items are not actually rendered anywhere
gotchas_discovered.impact: Feature is non-functional despite being marked complete

approach_outcome.summary: Added hamburger menu icon and state management for mobile navigation, but the actual mobile menu UI/drawer component implementation is missing
what_worked: MenuIcon imported and integrated into Header
State management setup for menu toggle
Proper MUI IconButton configuration with accessibility attributes
what_didnt_work: No visible mobile menu appears when hamburger is clicked
No integration with mobile navigation drawer/menu component
State is created but not consumed by any rendering logic

recommendations.description: Add a Drawer or Menu component that renders when mobileMenuOpen is true and displays navigation items appropriate for mobile view

recommendations.recommendation: Connect mobileMenuOpen state to menu rendering
recommendations.description: Ensure the hamburger menu toggle actually controls visibility of mobile navigation items
Verify hamburger menu appears correctly on mobile devices and is hidden on desktop with correct MUI breakpoints

recommendations.recommendation: Add close functionality to mobile menu
recommendations.description: Implement handler to close mobile menu when navigation items are clicked or when navigating to a new route
Add smooth transitions/animations when mobile menu opens/closes for better UX
